text: 'There are more things in Heaven and Earth, Horatio, than are dreamt of in your philosophy'
author: Shakespeare

text: 'One apple a day keeps the doctor away'
author: Old saying

text: 'Don't judge a book by its cover'
author: Old saying

text: 'To be or not to be: that is the question'
author: Shakespeare

text: 'Who controls the past controls the future. Who controls the present controls the past'
author: George Orwell

text: 'Logic will get you from A to Z; imagination will get you everywhere.'
author: Albert Einstein

text: 'Pleasure in the job puts perfection in the work'
author: Aristotle

text: 'Roses are red // Violets are blue, // Sugar is sweet // And so are you.'
author: Folk song

text: 'Everything we hear is an opinion, not a fact. Everything we see is a perspective, not the truth'
author: Marcus Aurelius

text: 'It is only with the heart that one can see clearly. What is essential is invisible to the eye.'
author: Le Petit Prince

text: ' The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.'
author: Nelson Mandela

text: 'Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.'
author: Steve Jobs

text: 'The best way to predict the future is to invent it.'
author: Alan Kay

text: 'Life is a journey, not a destination.'
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: 'Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.'
author: Dalai Lama

text: 'In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.'
author: Martin Luther King Jr.
